init.title: MeTube Manager options
init.description: This is where you add or remove feeds (do not use Add integration). One feed per line, then Submit. Each feed appears as a sensor (videos sent, last fetched). YouTube: 'channel or @handle | All/Videos/Shorts/Live | optional Backlog'. Manual: 'Name | RSS URL | optional Backlog'.

data.rss_feeds: Channels: @handle | feed_type | backlog, or Name | RSS URL | backlog
